retireMC

Monte Carlo tools for retirement planning.

Installation (development)

# devtools required
# install.packages("devtools")
```{r}
devtools::install_local("path/to/retireMC") # Use devtools::install_local for local install

```


Quick example

```{r}
library(retireMC)
res <- run_mc(initial = 1e6, n_years = 30, n_sims = 2000,
              withdraw = 60000, infl_rate = 0.02,
              returns_args = list(model="gbm", mu=0.07, sigma=0.15, seed=123))

# Check success rate
res$metrics$success_rate

# Plot results
plot_percentile_bands(res$wealth)
```
